titleStmt.title: A compendious forme of prayer, for the whole es[tate] of Christes church necessarye to be vsed of all estates at tyme conuenient. / Newely collected and set forth, in the yeare of our Lorde. 1565. Seene and allowed according to the order appointed in the Quenes Maiesties iniunctions.

A compendious forme of prayer, for the whole es[tate] of Christes church necessarye to be vsed of all estates at tyme conuenient. / Newely collected and set forth, in the yeare of our Lorde. 1565. Seene and allowed according to the order appointed in the Quenes Maiesties iniunctions.

publicationStmt.publisher: for Henry Sanderson by Richard Serll, dwellyng in Flete lane at the sygne of the halfe Egle and the Key.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Eton College. Library.
